MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD8 postcode area of Kelso & Jedburgh. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 08:23am due to a grounded overhead line at Buchtrig Farm and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the grounded overhead line affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:45am on the 8th fo January 2021.
